components.KlarnaMessage: Klarna Authorized, click save to continue
components.sliceItMessage: Pay for your order in instalments.

sepaMandateMsg.mandateTitle: SEPA Direct Debit Mandate for single payment
sepaMandateMsg.msg1: By accepting this mandate form, you authorise (A)
sepaMandateMsg.msg2: to send instructions to your bank to debit your account (B)
sepaMandateMsg.msg3: your bank to debit your account in accordance with the instructions from
sepaMandateMsg.msg4: As part of your rights, you are entitled to a refund from your bank under the terms and conditions of your agreement with your bank. A refund must be claimed within 8 weeks starting from the date on which your account was debited.
sepaMandateMsg.sepaAccept: I accept the mandate for a single payment
sepaMandateMsg.footerMsg: Your rights regarding the above mandate are explained in a statement that you can obtain from your bank.
